name: Rely Services Inc
tagline: Business Process Outsourcing - BPO done right!
description:
We can offer all businesses, large and small, a highly trained, professional, experienced staff at significant savings! We use only cutting-edge techniques- the latest in hardware, software and personnel training. Headquartered in the USA, with offices in India, Australia and the UAE, we have a global reach with a local touch, and can provide a multitude of business services. We are Business Process Outsourcing- BPO- done right!
Founded in 1997, with headquarter in Hoffman Estates (Greater Chicago Area), Illinois, USA and global facilities in Pune, India and Australlia, Rely Services Inc is an IT outsourcing and software development company. Our services include IT staffing, Management Consulting, Software Development, Infrastructure Management and Business Process Outsourcing. 
Rely leverages enterprise data to boost organizational performance, streamline business operations and create new channels for company’s growth. Our wide range of IT services possess the cutting edge technology expertise. The company believes in building the trust and carve out a niche for itself in the IT industry by acquiring elite clientele.
We enjoy work and believe in the never ending quest to improve while performing 24x7.
